content: Dear Yellow, I am reaching out to explore the possibility of establishing defense and security cooperation agreements between our nations. Given the current regional tensions, it is important for us to work together to enhance our mutual security. Let us discuss the details and potential areas of collaboration. Regards, Orange

Yellow's public criticism of Orange's actions is baseless and hypocritical. We have the right to protect our national interests and ensure our security. Their words are an attempt to undermine our legitimacy and divert attention from their own aggressive actions. Orange calls on Yellow to reflect on their own behavior and act responsibly in the international community.

We strongly condemn your engagement in international arbitration against us. Such actions undermine our objectives and threaten our national security. We demand an immediate halt to these proceedings and a return to peaceful dialogue.
